news.title: Novo Nordisk cuts direct-to-consumer prices for Wegovy, Ozempic to $349 a month
news.summary: The announcements come days after President Donald Trump struck deals with Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly to make their GLP-1s easier for Americans to access.

news.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang surprised investors with a 'half a trillion' forecast. It'll come up at earnings
news.summary: "Half a trillion dollars worth so far," Huang said at the company's GTC conference in Washington last month. "This is how much business is on the books," he said.

news.title: India deepens energy trade with U.S. to mend trade relations amid tariff strain
news.summary: India is increasing its energy imports from the U.S. in the hopes that the move could pave the way to a trade deal between the two countries.

news.title: Jeep eyes U.S. comeback following yearslong sales troubles
news.summary: Jeep has experienced six consecutive years of U.S. sales declines. It has experienced a leadership carousel, dearth of new products and push into luxury.

news.title: 'We haven't sold our soul to the devil': Switzerland's trade deal with the U.S. divides opinion
news.summary: Switzerland's trade deal with the U.S. has its supporters and detractors. The Swiss economy is likely to take a hit, deal or no deal.

news.title: Boeing’s 777X has had its problems, but the orders keep coming
news.summary: Boeing announced an order of 65 777X twin-engine aircraft from Dubai-based Emirates. GE Aerospace received orders for 130 engines to fly those jets.

news.title: ‘I’m a big fan of DIY investing’: I’m 64 and moving to the U.S. I have $2.6 million, but no Social Security. Will I be OK?
news.summary: Advisers do well in bull markets and poorly in bear markets. “I generally do better during downturns than the S&P 500.”

news.title: Morgan Stanley hikes S&P 500 target for next year. Here are the plays to make.
news.summary: of earnings growth and an accommodative Fed will support market multiples, says Mike Wilson. Earnings growth and a accommodativeFed will supportMarket multiples says Wilson.

news.title: Peter Thiel follows SoftBank in quitting Nvidia position as talk of AI bubble intensifies
news.summary: A week after Japan’s richest man disclosed that his firm fully divested his $5.8 billion stake in Nvidia, one of America's richest, Peter Thiel, has said he's done the same.

news.title: Alphabet’s stock gets a Buffett bump. Here’s the next big Google catalyst.
news.summary: Google's Gemini 3.0 could advance the company's AI positioning. Anticipation is building for the release of Google's new AI software.
